title: Microsoft Edge: Updates to Settings pages on privacy, security, search, & services
description: To improve ease of use, we are updating Edge settings page into two sections: ‘Privacy and Security’ and ‘Search and Services.’ This streamlined approach should enable users to find the settings they are interested in more easily.  Note: We have made the decision to cancel this planned release. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. We continue to investigate different ways to enhance the user experience of the Edge settings page.
